pullRequest.title: Add proper time filtering to rating graph
pullRequest.bodyText:
Change rating graph x axis to month/year and add in ability for showing only recent activity. Also use combo box for rating type for easier integration with multiple ratings.
Fixes #935
Fixes #1220
